text: James Marape (born 24 April 1971) is a Papua New Guinea politician. He has been a member of the National Parliament of Papua New Guinea since July 2007, representing the electorate of Tari-Pori Open. On 30 May 2019, he was nominated, elected, and sworn in as the 8th Prime Minister of Papua New Guinea by the National Parliament. ==References== Category:1971 births Category:Living people Category:Current national leaders Category:Prime Ministers of Papua New Guinea Category:National Parliament of Papua New Guinea
title: James Marape
